channel.title: Comments on: Log4J logging to the console

item.title: By: Ben Poole
item.dc:creator: Ben Poole
item.description: <p>No need to even do that! In log4j.properties. simply configure an appender for the console (i.e. standard out and standard error). Something like this should do it:<br/>log4j.appender.stdout=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender<br /><br /></p>
item.content:encoded:
No need to even do that! In log4j.properties. simply configure an appender for the console (i.e. standard out and standard error). Something like this should do it:
log4j.appender.stdout=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
